languages.text: Спустя две вахты усердного труда рабочие смогли стабилизировать таинственный корабль. Проникнувших внутрь солдат встретило множество безжизненных субтильных тел неизвестной ксенорасы. Отозвавшись на присутствие чужаков, до этого спящие защитные системы корабля ожили — смертоносные, поражающие своей жестокостью ловушки обрушились на бойцов!

traits.locale_text: Спустя две вахты усердного труда рабочие смогли стабилизировать друкарский корабль. Проникнувших внутрь солдат встретило множество безжизненных субтильных тел неизвестной ксенорасы. Отозвавшись на присутствие чужаков, до этого спящие защитные системы корабля ожили — смертоносные, поражающие своей жестокостью ловушки обрушились на бойцов!

languages.text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.
languages.original_text: Спустя две вахты усердного труда рабочие смогли стабилизировать таинственный корабль. Проникнувших внутрь солдат встретило множество безжизненных субтильных тел неизвестной ксенорасы. Отозвавшись на присутствие чужаков, до этого спящие защитные системы корабля ожили — смертоносные, поражающие своей жестокостью ловушки обрушились на бойцов!

traits.locale_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilize the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have sprung to action on all decks.

After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

languages.text: 经过两巡的艰苦劳动，工人们成功稳定住了黑暗灵族的虚空舰。进入飞船的士兵们发现了虚空舰坠毁时一同毙命的异形尸体。船上的系统察觉到了入侵者，立刻做出了反应，所有甲板上都启动了致命的陷阱。
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

traits.locale_text: 经过两巡的艰苦劳动，工人们成功稳定住了黑暗灵族的虚空舰。进入飞船的士兵们发现了虚空舰坠毁时一同毙命的异形尸体。船上的系统察觉到了入侵者，立刻做出了反应，所有甲板上都启动了致命的陷阱。

languages.text: 2時間に及ぶ過酷な労働の末、作業員たちは謎のヴォイドシップを安定させることに成功した。船内に入った兵士たちが目にしたのは、正体不明の異種族の生気のないほっそりとした死体だった。船のシステムは侵入者に反応し、全甲板で驚くほど残酷で恐ろしい罠が作動し始めた。
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

traits.locale_text: 2時間に及ぶ過酷な労働の末、作業員たちは謎のヴォイドシップを安定させることに成功した。船内に入った兵士たちが目にしたのは、正体不明の異種族の生気のないほっそりとした死体だった。船のシステムは侵入者に反応し、全甲板で驚くほど残酷で恐ろしい罠が作動し始めた。

languages.text: Tras dos guardias de duro trabajo, los trabajadores consiguieron estabilizar la misteriosa nave del vacío. Los soldados que entraron en la nave se encontraron con los esbeltos cuerpos sin vida de xenos sin identificar. Los sistemas de la nave reaccionaron ante los intrusos y se activaron trampas mortales en todas las cubiertas.
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

traits.locale_text: Tras dos guardias de duro trabajo, los trabajadores consiguieron estabilizar la misteriosa nave del vacío. Los soldados que entraron en la nave se encontraron con los esbeltos cuerpos sin vida de xenos sin identificar. Los sistemas de la nave reaccionaron ante los intrusos y se activaron trampas mortales en todas las cubiertas.

languages.text: Nach zwei Wachschichten voll harter Arbeit gelang es den Arbeitern, das mysteriöse Raumschiff zu stabilisieren. Die Soldaten, die in das Schiff gegangen waren, fanden dort die schlanken Leichen unbekannter Xenos vor. Die Systeme des Schiffs haben auf die Eindringlinge reagiert, und sinnlos grausame, tödliche Fallen wurden auf allen Decks aktiviert.
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

traits.locale_text: Nach zwei Wachschichten voll harter Arbeit gelang es den Arbeitern, das mysteriöse Raumschiff zu stabilisieren. Die Soldaten, die in das Schiff gegangen waren, fanden dort die schlanken Leichen unbekannter Xenos vor. Die Systeme des Schiffs haben auf die Eindringlinge reagiert, und sinnlos grausame, tödliche Fallen wurden auf allen Decks aktiviert.

languages.text: Après deux quarts de dur labeur, les ouvriers parviennent à stabiliser le mystérieux vaisseau. Les soldats qui s'aventurent dans ses entrailles y découvrent les minces corps sans vie de xénos non identifiés. Réagissant à la présence des intrus, les systèmes embarqués déclenchent les nombreux pièges mortels dont ses ponts sont truffés.
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.

traits.locale_text: Après deux quarts de dur labeur, les ouvriers parviennent à stabiliser le mystérieux vaisseau. Les soldats qui s'aventurent dans ses entrailles y découvrent les minces corps sans vie de xénos non identifiés. Réagissant à la présence des intrus, les systèmes embarqués déclenchent les nombreux pièges mortels dont ses ponts sont truffés.

languages.text: İki saat süren zorlu çalışmanın ardından işçiler, Drukhari uçsuz gemisini dengeye oturtmayı başarıyor. Gemiye giren askerler, kimliği belirsiz zenoların cansız bedenleriyle karşılaşıyor. Geminin sistemleri, davetsiz misafirlere tepki veriyor. Tüm güvertelerde acımasız, ölümcül tuzaklar devreye giriyor.
languages.original_text: After two watches of hard labour, the workers managed to stabilise the mysterious voidship. The soldiers who entered the vessel were met with the lifeless slender bodies of unidentified xenos. The vessel's systems have reacted to the intruders, and senselessly cruel, deadly traps have been activated on all decks.
